participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, Jake is always up for trying new tricks on his skateboard.
participant_1.background: my favourite skater is rob dryden. i'm always wearing a hat. i'm a skateboarder. i've a broken arm. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Creative and a bit sentimental, Lily loves expressing herself through art and enjoys the company of her pet fish.
participant_2.background: i turned 18 years old yesterday. my favorite color is orange. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i've a pet fish.
